TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit MediaBrowserService extends Android.App.Service

Docs.summary: Base class for media browser services.

remarks.para: Base class for media browser services.

Media browser services enable applications to browse media content provided by an application and ask the application to start playing it. They may also be used to control content that is already playing by way of a MediaSession.
To extend this class, you must declare the service in your manifest file with an intent filter with the #SERVICE_INTERFACE action. For example:
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Gets the root hints sent from the currently connected MediaBrowser.

remarks.para: Gets the root hints sent from the currently connected MediaBrowser. The root hints are service-specific arguments included in an optional bundle sent to the media browser service when connecting and retrieving the root id for browsing, or null if none. The contents of this bundle may affect the information returned when browsing.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Gets the browser information who sent the current request.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void NotifyChildrenChanged(string parentId) cil managed
abstract member NotifyChildrenChanged : string -> unit override this.NotifyChildrenChanged : string -> unit

Docs.param: The id of the parent media item whose children changed.
Docs.summary: Notifies all connected media browsers that the children of the specified parent id have changed in some way.

remarks.para: Notifies all connected media browsers that the children of the specified parent id have changed in some way. This will cause browsers to fetch subscribed content again.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

abstract member NotifyChildrenChanged : string * Android.OS.Bundle -> unit override this.NotifyChildrenChanged : string * Android.OS.Bundle -> unit

Docs.param: The id of the parent media item whose children changed.
The bundle of service-specific arguments to send to the media browser. The contents of this bundle may contain the information about the change.
Docs.summary: Notifies all connected media browsers that the children of the specified parent id have changed in some way.

remarks.para: Notifies all connected media browsers that the children of the specified parent id have changed in some way. This will cause browsers to fetch subscribed content again.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract Android.Service.Media.MediaBrowserService.BrowserRoot? OnGetRoot (string clientPackageName, int clientUid, Android.OS.Bundle? rootHints);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Android.Service.Media.MediaBrowserService/BrowserRoot OnGetRoot(string clientPackageName, int32 clientUid, class Android.OS.Bundle rootHints) cil managed
abstract member OnGetRoot : string * int * Android.OS.Bundle -> Android.Service.Media.MediaBrowserService.BrowserRoot

Docs.param: The package name of the application which is requesting access to browse media.
The uid of the application which is requesting access to browse media.

An optional bundle of service-specific arguments to send to the media browser service when connecting and retrieving the root id for browsing, or null if none. The contents of this bundle may affect the information returned when browsing.
Docs.summary: Called to get the root information for browsing by a particular client.
Docs.returns: The BrowserRoot for accessing this app's content or null.
